---
  
  
## 安装

- Win10

[Git 下载地址](https://git-scm.com/downloads)

- Deepin

```sh
sudo apt update
sudo apt install git
```
  
  
## 配置

  
  
### Windows 配置环境变量

Settings > System > AdvanceSystemSetting > Environment Variables > Path > Edit
  
  
### 配置Git 全局姓名和邮箱

```sh
git config --global user.name "qiaogaojian"  
git config --global user.email "qiaogaojian@vip.qq.com"
```
  
  
### 生成并配置 ssh 密钥

```sh
ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "qiaogaojian@vip.qq.com" 
```

- Win10

```sh
cat C:\Users\Administrator\.ssh\id_rsa.pub # 显示公钥
```

- Deepin

```sh
# ssh 公钥
cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub # 显示公钥

# deepinvm
ssh-rsa  qiaogaojian@vip.qq.com

# ubuntuvm
ssh-rsa  qiaogaojian@vip.qq.com
```
然后复制ssh公钥到Github或Gitlab等后台的ssh公钥管理里.
  
  
### SSH 连接测试

  
```Shell
ssh -T git@gitee.com
ssh -T git@github.com
```
